attributes.action: not allow mp,s to police themselves
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: mp,s being not allowed to police themselves,as this creates a two tier system of law,as we know mp,s are not using the same law that they force upon the rest of us,this is discrimination towards the common people of this country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
